div.p: This page provides a list of the FHIR artifacts defined as part of this implementation guide.
Profiles to be supported by EMRs and payor systems conforming to this implementation guide

tr.td: CRD constraints on R4 Appointment resource mandating support for elements relevant to coverage requirements discovery
CRD constraints on R4 Appointment resource mandating support for elements relevant to inclusion in coverage requirements discovery proposed actions
CRD constraints on R4 Coverage resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification of a patient's coverage in coverage requirements queries
CRD constraints on R4 Coverage resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification of a coverage plan type without exposing patient identity
CRD constraints on R4 Device resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification and description of a device referenced by a DeviceRequest or other CRD-relevant resource
CRD constraints on R4 DeviceRequest resource mandating support for elements relevant to coverage requirements discovery
CRD constraints on R4 Encounter resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification and description of an encounter
CRD constraints on R4 Location resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification and description of the location of an event or ordered event
CRD constraints on R4 Medication resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification and description of a medication referenced by a MedicationRequest or other CRD-relevant resource
CRD constraints on R4 MedicationRequest resource mandating support for elements relevant to coverage requirements discovery
CRD constraints on R4 NutritionOrder resource mandating support for elements relevant to coverage requirements discovery
CRD constraints on R4 Organization resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification and description of the organization responsible for ordering or performing an activity
CRD constraints on R4 Patient resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification and description of the patient for whom coverage requirements are being discovered
CRD constraints on R4 Patient resource mandating support for elements relevant to sharing demographics relevant to coverage evaluation without revealing patient identity

CRD constraints on R4 Practitioner resource mandating support for elements relevant to identifying and describing a healthcare provider or administrative staff involved in performing a coverage requirement discovery-related action

CRD constraints on R4 PractitionerRole resource mandating support for elements relevant to identifying and describing a healthcare provider or administrative staff along with their role and responsible organization involved in performing a coverage requirement discovery-related action
CRD constraints on R4 ServiceRequest resource mandating support for elements relevant to coverage requirements discovery
CRD constraints on R4 Task resource describing how to request that a Questionnaire be completed

div.p: Extensions defined as part of this implementation guide

tr.td: Custom CRD extension that allows conveying insurance information associated with a request when the request resouce doesn't have a core element that supports capturing such information.

div.p: Search Parameters defined as part of this implementation guide

tr.td: Custom CRD R4 search parameter allowing search for appointments based on the associated insurance - allows use of _include to retrieve insurance when querying an appointment
Custom CRD R4 search parameter allowing search for encounters based on the associated insurance - allows use of _include to retrieve insurance when querying an encounter
Custom CRD R4 search parameter allowing search for medication requests based on the associated insurance - allows use of _include to retrieve insurance when querying a medication request
Custom CRD R4 search parameter allowing search for nutrition orders based on the associated insurance - allows use of _include to retrieve insurance when querying a nutrition order
Custom CRD R4 search parameter allowing search for service requests based on the associated insurance - allows use of _include to retrieve insurance when querying a service request

div.p: Value Sets and/or code systems defined as part of this implementation guide

tr.td: Codes for use with FHIR R4 to identify types of tasks relevant to coverage requirement discovery
Codes for use with FHIR R4 to identify reasons for task performance relevant to coverage requirement discovery
The subset of coverage classes relevant for coverage requirement discovery
The subset of FHIR R4 location address types relevant for coverage requirement discovery
All FHIR R4 task codes relevant to coverage requirements discovery
All FHIR R4 task reasons relevant to coverage requirements discovery
